articles.title: Monkeypox: Health Ministry lists do's and don'ts for viral disease - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Monkeypox (MPX) is a viral zoonotic disease with symptoms similar to smallpox, although with less clinical severity. MPX was first discovered in 1958 in colonies of monkeys kept for research, hence the name 'Monkeypox.'
